comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Blackburn He was born in New Year's Day, January 1, 1883. A lightweight, Blackburn had a long career in the sport, comprising some 147 professional fights, often against naturally bigger opponents, and finished with a final record of 99-26-19. He later became a trainer, most notably of heavyweight champion Joe Louis. He died on April 24, 1942.
